title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin believes we haven't come close to seeing Justin Herbert's full potential after another impressive win over a divisional rival. He discusses Tom Brady's performance in his return to New England and what became obvious about his departure from Bill Belichick after Sunday night. He unveils his Herd Hierarchy after week 4 of the NFL season. Plus, investigative reporter Seth Wickersham joins the show to share the best excerpts of his new book that details the break up of the Patriots Dynasty with Brady and Belichick.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
